title: Comments on No-Hair Theorems and Stabilty of Blackholes
abstract: In the light of recent blackhole solutions inspired by string theory, we review some old statements on field theoretic hair on blackholes. We also discuss some stability issues. In particular we argue that the two dimensional string blackhole solution is semi-classically stable while the naked singularity is unstable to tachyon fluctuations. Finally we comment on the relation between the linear dilaton theory and the $2d$ blackhole solution.
